translated: “Formerly I was in a bad way,
I didn’t get anything from the weaver Bhaṭa.
who had obtained food and drink,
I approached her🔽and asked for the going forth into homelessness.
Paṭācārā gave me the going forth.
she directed me to the highest goal.
The noble one’s advice was not in vain:
The Chapter of Fives is finished.
